product_name: Mad Rock Mad Face Chalk Bag - Kids'
long_description: Sized specifically for kids, the Mad Rock Mad Face chalk bag is the perfect accessory for your young climber. Drawstring with toggle closure keeps chalk from spilling when not in use. The Mad Rock Mad Face chalk bag includes an adjustable belt with side-release buckle. Chalk sold separately.
short_description: Sized specifically for kids, the Mad Rock Mad Face chalk bag is the perfect accessory for your young climber.
